orderId.description: The unique identifier of the order that was cancelled.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user who placed the order.

orderItems.description: A list of items included in the cancelled order, each containing product details and quantities.

productId.description: The unique identifier of the product.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product ordered.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the product.

totalPrice.description: The total price for this order item (quantity * unit price).

orderStatus.description: The current status of the order after cancellation.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the order that was cancelled.

cancellationReason.description: The reason for the order cancellation, if provided.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the order was cancelled.
